title: One Dublin One Book: meet the writers who got the capital reading

title: PUCC mandate for petrol withdrawn by Odisha govt!

title: Behind the Senators’ ‘Heated Rivalry’ jerseys that are flying off the shelves
desc: Ottawa is selling No. 81 "Rozanov" and No. 24 "Hollander" jerseys at its team store based on the two lead characters from the TV show.

title: NRM CEC endorses Among, Tayebwa for Speaker and Deputy
desc: Both Among and Tayebwa also drew support from CEC members due to the sacrifices that saw several independent-leaning NRM candidates who had contested against official party flag bearers step down.

title: ‘She narrowly escaped three bullets’: Pakistan’s trans community shaken by attacks and killings
desc: A wave of violence has left transgender people afraid to go out, as experts say the global rise of far-right ideology is fuelling transphobia

title: Alex Vindman, key Trump impeachment witness, launches Florida Senate run
desc: Army veteran Alex Vindman, a key witness during President Donald Trump’s first impeachment trial in 2019, is running for the Senate in Florida as a Democrat

title: Some still tout ivermectin as a cure-all. Here's what the science says
desc: Ivermectin had a cult-like following during the COVID-19 pandemic. Did science ever prove it was an effective treatment?

title: Venus may get a huge meteor shower this July, thanks to a long-ago asteroid breakup
desc: This coming July, Venus could plow through the dust generated by an asteroid breakup thousands of years ago, potentially sparking an impressive meteor shower.

title: Valve to face UK class action lawsuit with proposed damages of £656m

title: Northern Ireland's new drivers to face major licensing changes from October
